name: A Glitchy game.....
description:
A creepy game, with another player that reveals secrets to you about the game....

Explore, Find, Friend, And Conquer. That's the basic Idea of the game, still in development, with no clear ending.... With an  'I Will Kill You' atmosphere, mixed in with mystery and strage glitches makes it a perfect game to play in the dark....

-

STRUCTURE:

A computer that tells you what to reply to the player, but it gets harder as parts of the instructions get garbled, and eventually-all of the instructions are garbled or it just says: Instructions: -and it doesn't say anything....

sorry I can't tell you more! Your on your own now....

Happy Hunting!

-Player#3
